Segment.name: RED
Segment.comment: To provide business data related to an item within a transaction to which a business application editing process has been applied, and an error condition has resulted

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: RelatedDataIdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the nature of data related to an application edit error condition

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

Field.name: CodeListQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a specific industry code list

Field.name: IndustryCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

SyntaxNote.name: R0206
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of RED02 or RED06 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: E0206
SyntaxNote.comment: Only one of RED02 or RED06 may be present.

SyntaxNote.name: P030506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either RED03, RED05 or RED06 are present, then the others are required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0403
SyntaxNote.comment: If RED04 is present, then RED03 is required.
